input_text.Prompt:
The following is a product description written by our marketing expert using the following item features and item specification.

Item specification:
Plantronics EarBud Headset with  Noise-Canceling Microphone for Motorola Phones w, 2.5mm Plug

Item features:
Unparalleled comfort with unique Flex Grip design
Talk anywhere with the benefits of a noise-canceling microphone
Ultimate voice clarity with pivoting boom
Easy to use with quick, one-handed placement
Compatible with Motorola Phones with 2.5mm
input_text.Response A: Enjoy your calls with Plantronics' Earbud Headset with Noise-Canceling Microphone for Motorola Phones with 2.5mm Plug. This unique headset is designed for unparalleled comfort with a Flex Grip design that makes it easy to use with quick, one-handed placement. Plus, you can talk anywhere with the benefits of a noise-canceling microphone. The ultimate voice clarity with pivoting boom makes this headset easy to use.
input_text.Response B: The Plantronics EarBud Headset with Noise-Canceling Microphone for Motorola Phones with a 2.5mm Plug is a comfortable and easy-to-use headset that delivers the benefits of noise-canceling technology. The Plantronics EarBud Headset features an ultralow-profile design, so you can wear it comfortably all day. The unique FlexGrip design keeps the earpiece securely in place, so you can talk anywhere with ease. The boom microphone provides ultimate voice clarity, so your conversations will sound crystal clear. The Plantronics EarBud Headset is compatible with Motorola phones with a 2.5mm jack.
